languages.text: {n}Вам достаточно одного взгляда, чтобы понять — перед вами руны {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g}, таящие в себе мрачную угрозу рассудку и душе. Вы поспешно отводите взгляд, стараясь стереть из памяти начертание поганых символов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вам достаточно одного взгляда, чтобы понять — перед вами руны {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g}, таящие в себе мрачную угрозу рассудку и душе. Вы поспешно отводите взгляд, стараясь стереть из памяти начертание поганых символов.{/n}

languages.text: {n}One glance is enough to tell you that these are {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} runes, within which lurks a grim threat to mind and soul. You hastily avert your eyes, trying to wipe the foul symbols from your mind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам достаточно одного взгляда, чтобы понять — перед вами руны {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g}, таящие в себе мрачную угрозу рассудку и душе. Вы поспешно отводите взгляд, стараясь стереть из памяти начертание поганых символов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}One glance is enough to tell you that these are Chaos runes, within which lurks a grim threat to mind and soul. You hastily avert your gaze, trying to wipe the foul symbols from your mind.{/n}
{n}One glance is enough to tell you that these are Chaos runes, within which lurks a grim threat to mind and soul. You hastily avert your gaze, trying to wipe the foul symbols from your mind.{/n}
{n}One glance is enough to tell you that these are Chaos runes, within which lurks a grim threat to mind and soul. You hastily avert your gaze, trying to wipe the foul symbols from your mind.{/n}

{n}One glance is enough to tell you that these are {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} runes, within which lurks a grim threat to mind and soul. You hastily avert your gaze, trying to wipe the foul symbols from your mind.{/n}

{n}One glance is enough to tell you that these are {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} runes, within which lurks a grim threat to mind and soul. You hastily avert your eyes, trying to wipe the foul symbols from your mind.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你仅仅是瞟了一眼，就意识到这些文字是{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌{/g}的符文，其中隐藏着对思想与灵魂的重大威胁。你急忙移开了视线，试图将这些亵渎性的符号从你的脑海中抹去。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One glance is enough to tell you that these are {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} runes, within which lurks a grim threat to mind and soul. You hastily avert your eyes, trying to wipe the foul symbols from your mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你仅仅是瞟了一眼，就意识到这些文字是{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌{/g}的符文，其中隐藏着对思想与灵魂的重大威胁。你急忙移开了视线，试图将这些亵渎性的符号从你的脑海中抹去。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una mirada basta para determinar que se trata de runas del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Caos{/g}, en cuyo interior acecha una terrible amenaza para tu mente y tu alma. Apartas rápidamente la mirada mientras intentas eliminar los símbolos profanos de tu mente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One glance is enough to tell you that these are {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} runes, within which lurks a grim threat to mind and soul. You hastily avert your eyes, trying to wipe the foul symbols from your mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una mirada basta para determinar que se trata de runas del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Caos{/g}, en cuyo interior acecha una terrible amenaza para tu mente y tu alma. Apartas rápidamente la mirada mientras intentas eliminar los símbolos profanos de tu mente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一目見ただけで、これが{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌{/g}のルーンであり、その中に心と魂への恐ろしい脅威が潜んでいることがわかった。あなたは急いで目をそらし、汚らわしいシンボルを頭の中から消し去ろうとする。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One glance is enough to tell you that these are {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} runes, within which lurks a grim threat to mind and soul. You hastily avert your eyes, trying to wipe the foul symbols from your mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一目見ただけで、これが{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌{/g}のルーンであり、その中に心と魂への恐ろしい脅威が潜んでいることがわかった。あなたは急いで目をそらし、汚らわしいシンボルを頭の中から消し去ろうとする。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein Blick reicht aus, um zu erkennen, dass es sich hierbei um {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}-Runen handelt, in denen eine schwere Bedrohung für Geist und Seele lauert. Du wendest rasch den Blick ab und versuchst, die bösen Symbole aus deinem Verstand zu tilgen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One glance is enough to tell you that these are {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} runes, within which lurks a grim threat to mind and soul. You hastily avert your eyes, trying to wipe the foul symbols from your mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Blick reicht aus, um zu erkennen, dass es sich hierbei um {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}-Runen handelt, in denen eine schwere Bedrohung für Geist und Seele lauert. Du wendest rasch den Blick ab und versuchst, die bösen Symbole aus deinem Verstand zu tilgen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il vous suffit d'un regard pour savoir qu'il s'agit de runes du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} qui renferment une sinistre menace pour l'esprit et l'âme. Vous détournez rapidement le regard en essayant d'effacer les symboles infâmes de vos pensées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One glance is enough to tell you that these are {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} runes, within which lurks a grim threat to mind and soul. You hastily avert your eyes, trying to wipe the foul symbols from your mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous suffit d'un regard pour savoir qu'il s'agit de runes du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} qui renferment une sinistre menace pour l'esprit et l'âme. Vous détournez rapidement le regard en essayant d'effacer les symboles infâmes de vos pensées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir bakışta bunların {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Kaos{/g} rünleri olduğunu anlıyorsun. Rünler, akla ve ruha ciddi tehdit teşkil eden bir içeriğe sahip. Gözlerini derhâl ekranlardan ayırıp fena sembolleri aklından silmeye çalışıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One glance is enough to tell you that these are {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} runes, within which lurks a grim threat to mind and soul. You hastily avert your eyes, trying to wipe the foul symbols from your mind.{/n}
